articles.title: South Africa: Call for Whatsapp to Revise Privacy Policy in SA - AllAfrica.com
articles.description: The Information Regulator of South Africa has after correspondence, written to WhatsApp LLC requesting the company to revise its privacy policy in South Africa to the standard used in the European Union (EU).
